fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Clean a lynch (Alive)
- Clean a dead body (Dead)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a player you cleaned is lynched while you are alive, or killed at night while you are dead, you will clean them erasing their role and last will
- You may only having one player being cleaned at a time, but may switch who you clean. You may only successfully clean lynches and kills twice each
